title: Chicken and ham jambalaya
ingredients: ['300 g (10½ oz) skinless boneless chicken breasts (fillets)', '2 tsp Cajun seasoning (see note below)', '1 tsp dried sage or marjoram', '2 tbsp sunflower oil', '1 onion, sliced', '1 green pepper, seeded and sliced', '2 celery sticks, sliced', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '400 g (14 oz) basmati rice', '1 litre (1¾ pints) chicken stock, preferably home-made', '100 g (3½ oz) cooked smoked ham, cubed', '1 can Italian cherry tomatoes, or 1 can chopped tomatoes, about 400 g', 'Tabasco sauce, salt and pepper', 'To garnish', '4–6 spring onions, trimmed and chopped', 'coarsely chopped parsley']
